original_text: As Samuel was offering up the burnt offering, the Philistines drew near to attack Israel. But the Lord thundered with a mighty sound that day against the Philistines and threw them into confusion, and they were defeated before Israel.
korean_text: 사무엘이 번제를 드릴 때에 블레셋 사람이 이스라엘과 싸우려고 가까이 오매 그 날에 여호와께서 블레셋 사람에게 큰 우레를 발하여 그들을 어지럽게 하시니 그들이 이스라엘 앞에 패한지라

sentences.original_text: As Samuel was offering up the burnt offering
the Philistines drew near to attack Israel.
sentences.korean_translation: 블레셋 사람들이 이스라엘을 치려고 가까이 왔습니다.

sentences.original_text: But the Lord thundered with a mighty sound that day
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그 날 여호와께서 큰 소리로 우레치셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: against the Philistines and threw them into confusion,
and they were defeated before Israel.
